About Me Text: Full Stack Software Developer with a passion for developing cutting-edge technologies. I focus on simplifying and automating processes to help companies work smarter and deliver better results. I approach every task with the discipline, commitment, and adaptability of a professional basketball player. My experience spans frontend, backend, deployment, testing, customer support, and helping clients solve technical issues — a versatility I’m excited to bring to my next role. I’m always improving, not only in programming, but also by learning to speak my fourth language, German.
